Plain link: >
  [[This is a link]]
With description: >
  [[This is a link source|Description of the link]]
  
  Alt+c - quick change directory
  Ctrl+o - change screen to bash [[prompt]]
  Ctrl+n - next line
  Ctrl+p - previous line
  * - select all files in directory
  - - unselect group of files 
  Ctrl+\ - directory hotlinks 
  	If you regulary use some specific directories you can add it here for
	easier access.
  Ctrl+s - search and place coursor on founded file
  Alt+i - will make the other panel show the same directory as active panel
  Ctrl+u - swap panels
  Alt+Enter - moves selected file name to prompt 
  	For example to edit in VIM:
		vi [Alt+Enter]
  Ctrl+Shift+Enter - moves selected full path of file to prompt		
  Ctrl+p - moves current directory to prompt
  F4 - edit a file
  F9 - dropdown menu
  Esc+Tab+Esc+Tab - list all autocompletion for files/directories
  Alt+Shift+h - shows directory history
